prompts: Create a gooey Pokemon with vibrant colors and a unique body shape.
Show me a toxic-type Pokemon that thrives in urban environments.
Design a squishy creature with a mix of purple and black shades.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with a slimy texture.
Generate a Pokemon with an amorphous body and a mischievous personality.
Make a sludge-themed Pokemon that can evolve into something more powerful.
Give me a creature resembling a puddle of goo with an interesting backstory.
